org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.extensibility

Class QueryBackendRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.extensibility.QueryBackendRegistry

  • public class QueryBackendRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry component for storing all known query backend factories.
    Since:
    0.9
    Author:
    Zoltan Ujhelyi

      • registerQueryBackendFactory

        public void registerQueryBackendFactory(java.lang.Class<? extends IQueryBackend> backend,
                                        IQueryBackendFactory factory)
        Registers a factory instance for a backend class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a factory is already registered for the selected backend

      • getFactory

        public IQueryBackendFactory getFactory(java.lang.Class<? extends IQueryBackend> backend)
        Returns a factory for the selected backend class. If no factories are available for the selected backend, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        backend -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no corresponding backend is registered into the factory

      • getAllKnownFactories

        Returns all known factory instances in an iterable object
